items.text: slower length ball, pushed down the ground towards mid-off for a quick one
back of a length, angled across, loosely swings away from the body and gets beaten
items.shortText: Jarvis to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: short of good length on middle, stays back and whips it away behind square
back of a length outside off, plays late to point
items.shortText: Jarvis to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: good length, angled across close to off, Sarkar trusts the angle and shoulders arms
items.shortText: Jarvis to Soumya Sarkar, no run

items.text: angles a length ball in too sharply and it skips down leg
good length, nips away outside off and takes the edge to third man
full and angled down leg
full on middle, clipped to deep midwicket
slaps it just over extra cover leaping back as he fails to get entirely on top of this short one
full, angled into middle, pushed back
items.shortText: Ngarava to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: short, no pace, so all the time he needs to pick that and slap it over the in-field at cover
items.shortText: Ngarava to Imrul Kayes, FOUR runs

items.text: beautiful placement. Short of a length, waits and opens the face pretty late to split point and cover-point with laser-guided precision
items.shortText: Ngarava to Imrul Kayes, FOUR runs

items.text: just back of a length, angled across, slashes at it and gets an edge down to third man, past first slip diving to his left
items.shortText: Jarvis to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.text: back of a length on middle, tucked to midwicket

in the sir again, and again it's past the fielder diving. Gets on his toes to deal with the bounce of this short of a length delivery, and punched just past point diving to his right. Bangladesh rushing through with a barrage of boundaries but not all of them have been convincing
items.shortText: Jarvis to Imrul Kayes, FOUR runs

items.text: shapes to play into the leg side but misses and gets hit on the pad. Has it pitched outside leg? Was it high? Pitched outside leg, as replays confirm
items.shortText: Jarvis to Imrul Kayes, no run

items.text: pushes away from the body again.. another streaky boundary, off the outside edge to third man
items.shortText: Jarvis to Imrul Kayes, FOUR runs

items.text: full, angled across, driven to the right of mid-off for a very quick single
length ball outside off, opens the face to third man
back of a length outside off, slapped hard through the covers
items.shortText: Tiripano to Soumya Sarkar, FOUR runs

items.text: short of length, punched to the right of point
back of a length on off, tucked to midwicket

items.preText: Ron: "This is where Imrul (and Bangladesh in general), need to read the room. No need for silly shots and too much risk taking. Smart cricket will get the job done. "
items.text: full on off, turns it away to the on side off the inside of the bat
short of length, outside off, punched to deep point
